patch:
@@ -53,11 +53,6 @@ smtp.hostname=${SMTP_HOSTNAME} smtp.port=465 factory.value=javax.net.ssl.SSLSocketFactory -from.email.use_ip_whitelist=${SMTP_USE_IP_ALLOWLIST} - -# Domain should be the email domain excluding the end, -# i.e. rocketturtle instead of rocketturtle.net -from.email.domain=${FROM_EMAIL_DOMAIN} messaging.fcm.url=${FCM_API_URL}/send @@ -72,7 +67,7 @@ response.server.url.participant.withdraw=${RESPONSE_DATASTORE_URL}/participant/w # Feedback & Contactus mail content ends confirmation.mail.subject=Welcome to the {{appName}} app! -confirmation.mail.content=
Hi

Thank you for registering your account with the {{appName}} app!

Your sign-up process is almost complete. Please use the code provided below to
complete the email verification step in the mobile app.

{{securitytoken}}

This code can be used only once and is valid for a period of ${email.code.expire_time} hours only.

For any questions or assistance, please write to {{contactEmail}}

Thanks,
The {{appName}} support team
----------------------------------------------------
Note: This is an auto-generated email. Please do not reply.
+confirmation.mail.content=
Hi

Your sign-up process is almost complete. Please use the code provided below to
complete the email verification step in the mobile app.

{{securitytoken}}

This code can be used only once and is valid for a period of ${email.code.expire_time} hours only.

For any questions or assistance, please write to {{contactEmail}}.

Thanks,
